original: < ze_Illusory_World >
zh_trans: < ze_Illusory_World >

original: < Map by BlackRock. >
zh_trans: < 地图由 BlackRock 制作. >

original: < CS2 Port by @Seth. >
zh_trans: <  由@Seth.移植到CS2  >

original: Human Fire -Freeze zombie 9 sec. 50 cd.
zh_trans: 人类火 - 冻结僵尸 9 秒,50 秒冷却.

original: Zombie Snow -Slow human around you for 3 sec. 30 cd
zh_trans: 僵尸冰 - 减速周围的人类持续 3 秒,30秒冷却.

original: Zombie Speed -Speed up zombie around you for 3 sec. 60 cd
zh_trans: 僵尸加速 - 加速周围的僵尸持续 3 秒,60秒冷却.

original: Open the hole in 40 seconds
zh_trans: 传送门将在40秒后开启

original: Transfer AFK player in 10 seconds
zh_trans: 10秒后传送挂机玩家

original: Human Ice -Freeze zombie 6 sec. 60 cd
zh_trans: 人类冰 - 冻结僵尸 6 秒,60秒冷却.

original: Human Heal -Heal 200 hp,speed up 3 sec and Immune infection 5 sec. 65 cd.
zh_trans: 人类治疗 - 恢复200 生命值, 加速 3 秒并免疫感染 5 秒, 65秒冷却.

original: Open the stone gate in 20 seconds
zh_trans: 石门将在20秒后开启

original: Zombie Flamethrower -Shoot flame 3 sec. 80 cd
zh_trans: 僵尸火 - 向前方喷射火焰持续3秒，80秒冷却

original: Defeat the guardian of ancient will
zh_trans: 击败远古意志的守护者

original: The slate will open in 20 seconds
zh_trans: 石板将在 20 秒后打开

original: <--Press E to attack,Top head E to use ultimate.-->
zh_trans: <--平视按E使用普通攻击，头顶按E使用终极-->

original: <--A human has picked White Knight-->
zh_trans: <--一位玩家成为了白骑士-->

original: Send AFK player to level 1 in 15 seconds
zh_trans: 挂机玩家将在15秒后传送至第一层

original: The iron door will break down in 30 seconds
zh_trans: 铁门将在30秒后被破坏

original: After 20 seconds, the stone slabs on both sides were destroyed
zh_trans: 20秒后，两侧石板会被破坏

original: Send AFK player to level 2 in 5 seconds
zh_trans: 挂机玩家将在5秒后传送至第二层

original: Turn on the last transfer after 30 seconds and close after 10 seconds
zh_trans: 最后一次传送将在30秒后开启并在10秒后关闭

original: << The door of satan open 60 second >>
zh_trans: << 撒旦之门将在60秒后开启 >>

original: Trigger the final battle in 5 seconds
zh_trans: 5秒后触发最终决战

original: Ready to die?
zh_trans: 准备迎接你的死期了吗？

original: After 10 seconds, the platform will rise to meet the final challenge
zh_trans: 10秒后，平台将会升起，准备迎接最后的挑战

original: << The door of satan open 40 second >>
zh_trans: << 撒旦之门 40 秒后开启 >>

original: After 5 seconds, the platform will rise to meet the final challenge
zh_trans: 5秒后，平台将会升起，准备迎接最后的挑战
